description:
JOIN OVER +2400 SUCCESSFUL STUDENTS WHO ALREADY TOOK THIS COURSE!

ACTIONABLE SEO TIPS & STRATEGIES TO GET YOU STARTED RIGHT AWAY + FREQUENTLY ASKED SEO QUESTIONS ANSWERED!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Do you wish to work from home? Or have a secondary income source? Do you wish to travel yet still have online income to support your adventures? Do you wish to earn more and work less hours?

Then this is the ideal course for you. It is perfectly suited for all types of web enthusiasts. It doesn't matter if you are a novice at SEO, intermediate or expert this course is ideal for any level of SEO knowledge.

In the case that you do wish to pursue a career in SEO or start an SEO based business then the advice on constructing an SEO Audit and SEO Proposal in this course is a must.

With this course you will learn:

•The foundations of Search Engine Optimization

•What is an Ideal SEO Strategy

•Onsite SEO:

- Keyword Research, Difficulty and Trends.

- Onsite SEO Factors & Technical changes

- Content Strategy

- Google Panda

•Offsite SEO:

- Successful Link Building

- Social Media

- Outreach

- Google Penguin

•How to do an SEO proposal and SEO Audit

•Local & Global SEO

•All the SEO Tools needed

•How I made $200k in one year

•SEO Quiz complete with answers

If you purchase this course you will also get my full help and support with regards to your online or purely SEO based venture. You can submit your questions through LinkedIn Messages and I will reply and help you with all your business needs.

See you on the other side!

Aires
title: SEO Secrets: Become An SEO Pro Today!
